argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_gcdneg | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( N gcd -u M ) = ( N gcd M ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N gcd -u M ) = ( N gcd M ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( M e. ZZ -> -u M e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | #P_gcdcom | |- ( ( -u M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( -u M gcd N ) = ( N gcd -u M ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( -u M gcd N ) = ( N gcd -u M ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_gcdcom | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M gcd N ) = ( N gcd M ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 5, 6 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( -u M gcd N ) = ( M gcd N ) ) |
